long_description: From city streets to the bike path, the Bell Indy Bike Helmet offers no-fuss, very comfortable protection with an easy-to-use fit system. In-mold helmet construction bonds a flyweight shell to a high-performance expanded polystyrene foam liner for excellent protection and low weight. Fit system offers single-handed adjustment: a simple press of the button and slide of the dial bring firm, snug and comfortable stability. Cam-lock strap levers make it easy to adjust the straps around your ears: simply open the cam, position comfortably and close the lever for a secure fit. The Bell Indy Bike Helmet features a snap-in visor for extra protection and reflective decals to enhance visibility.
